page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN SALPERTON AREA
page.content: Salperton Park employs a Farm Manager,4 tractor drivers,2 herdsmen,1 shepherd,1 maintenance man,1 student and 2 gamekeepers.6 women work on a part-time basis as groom, calves -minder,gamekeeper's assistant, house-cleaner, gardener and sectretary dealing with holiday bookings.For three months during harvest-time 2 extra students are taken on .Labour relations are good. Hampen Manor farm employs 1 full-time assistant (the owner's son) and one part-time hand ,a retired pensioner.At Soundborough there are 10 people employed on the estate.A few smaller farms are worked by their owners and families .Some half a dozen work in nearby towns .The only non agricultural undertaking ,formerly a garage,now makes garden statuary.
